name: Loan Risk Predictor
description:
A machine learning model that predicts the likelihood of loan defaults based on borrower attributes using Supervised Learning techniques. The model analyzes past loan data to provide risk assessments.

Technologies Used:

  • Python
  • Scikit-Learn
  • XGBoost
  • Pandas & NumPy
  • Flask (for API deployment)
  • PostgreSQL

name: DeepRacer ML Model
description:
A reinforcement learning model trained on AWS DeepRacer to autonomously drive a virtual car around a track. The model leverages Deep Q-Learning and Policy Gradient Methods to improve driving efficiency.

Technologies Used:

  • Python
  • AWS DeepRacer
  • TensorFlow
  • Reinforcement Learning Algorithms
